{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3405614,"name":"Polar","username":"polar","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/polar/{size}/204423_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-05T22:47:35.264Z","cooked":"

FTC Team 23396 Hivemind is proud to present our CAD & Engineering Portfolio for our 2024 season.

  • Onshape: Centerstage Robot
  • Portfolio: Centerstage Portfolio (Images & Names are redacted)

Won the Think Award and placed 3rd Inspire at our regionals

Our robot was a 12x12 coaxial swerve drive, with horizontal and vertical slides

Robot1920×1440 228 KB

Please feel free to ask any questions and we’ll answer them
